content: post ch1 turn around to the other side of the v sts and 5dc around the 2nd post *skip next v st 5dc around first post of next v st chain 1 5dc around 2nd post of v st* repeat around and join to the edge of the first scale and in between the posts of the next v st 10 8 6 scales made row 4 standard row foundation ch3 double_crochet in v st below chain 2 *2dc in middle of crocodile st below chain 2 2dc in next v st and around the sides of the two crocodile sts below chain 2* repeat around join to first v with a slip_stitch 20 16 12 v sts made crocodile front - turn to the side and slip_stitch into the first post of the v st chain 3 and 4dc around the post ch1 turn around to the other side of the v sts and 5dc around the 2nd post *skip next v st 5dc around first post of next v st chain 1 5dc around 2nd post of v st* repeat around and join to the edge of the first scale and in between the posts of the next v st 10 8 6 scales made row 5-8 repeat row 4 row 9 foundation ch3 double_crochet in v st below chain 2 2dc in middle of crocodile st below chain 2 2dc in next v st and around the sides of the two crocodile sts below chain 2 2dc in next horizontal bar chain 2 2dc in middle of crocodile st below chain 2 2dc in next horizontal bar chain 2 2dc in next v st and around the sides of the two crocodile sts below chain 2 *2dc in middle of crocodile st below chain 2 2dc in next v st and around the sides of the two crocodile sts below chain 2 * repeat to last two scales 2dc in next horizontal bar chain 2 2dc in middle of crocodile st below chain 2 2dc in next horizontal bar chain 2 2dc in next v st and around the sides of the two crocodile sts below chain 2 2dc in middle of crocodile st below chain 2 join to first v with a slip_stitch 24 20 16 v sts made crocodile front - turn to the side and slip_stitch into the first post of the v st chain 3 and 4dc around the post ch1 turn around to the other side of the v sts and 5dc around the 2nd post *skip next v st 5dc around first post of next v st chain 1 5dc around 2nd post of v st* repeat around and join to the edge of the first scale and in between the posts of the next v st 12 10 8 scales made row 10- 11 repeat row 4 12 10 8 scales made row 12 repeat row 9 28 24 20 v sts made 14 12 10 scales made row 13-15
